contentrichtext.text: {{italic title}} [[File:Seattle Chinese Post & NW Asian Weekly.jpg|thumb|Headquarters of the ''Seattle Chinese Post'' and ''Northwest Asian Weekly'' (2007)]] The '''''Northwest Asian Weekly''''' is a weekly [[Asian American]] [[newspaper]] based in [[Seattle, Washington]]'s [[International District, Seattle, Washington|International District]]. Distributed free, it was founded in 1982 by [[Assunta Ng]], founder of the ''[[Seattle Chinese Post]]''. It has a circulation of 16,000. ==External links== {{Portal|Seattle|Journalism|Asian Americans}} *[http://www.nwasianweekly.com/ Official website] [[Category:Asian-American culture in Washington (state)]] [[Category:Asian-American press]] [[Category:Companies based in Seattle, Washington]] [[Category:Newspapers published in Seattle, Washington]] {{Washington-newspaper-stub}}
